title: Shopify App Store Scraper · Apify
name: Shopify App Store Scraper
description: Use this scrapper to collect data about apps on the Shopify app store, including titles, handles, descriptions, ratings and more.
full_readme:
Getting started with Apify actors

The README.md file documents what your actor does and how to use it, which is then displayed in the Console or Apify Store. It's always a good idea to write a README.md. In a few months, not even you will remember all the details about the actor.

You can use Markdown language for rich formatting.

Documentation reference
Apify SDK
Crawlee
Apify Actor documentation
Apify CLI
Writing a README

See our tutorial on writing READMEs for your actors if you need more inspiration.
readme_summary:
# Getting started with Apify actors

The `README.md` file documents what your actor does and how to use it, which
is then displayed in the Console or Apify Store. It's always a good idea to
write a `README.md`. In a few months, not even you will remember all the
details about the actor.

You can use [Markdown](https://www.markdownguide.org/cheat-sheet) language for
rich formatting.

## Documentation reference

  * [Apify SDK](https://docs.apify.com/sdk/js)
  * [Crawlee](https://crawlee.dev)
  * [Apify Actor documentation](https://docs.apify.com/actor)
  * [Apify CLI](https://docs.apify.com/cli)

## Writing a README

See our tutorial on [writing READMEs for your
actors](https://help.apify.com/en/articles/2912548-how-to-write-great-readme-
for-your-actors) if you need more inspiration.
